info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 8:49PM MDT until June 09 at 10:17AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Montana... Milk River at Glasgow affecting Valley County. For the Milk River...including Glasgow...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Milk River at Glasgow. * WHEN...Until late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Some flooding will also occur on area farmlands. At 26.8 feet, Back trail in Sullivan Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM MDT Monday the stage was 28.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM MDT Monday was 28.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 26.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then rise to 27.0 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will fall below flood stage late Thursday morning to 14.3 feet Monday morning then rise again. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.2 feet on 05/12/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Milk River Glasgow 25.0 28.2 Mon 8 pm MDT 26.5 26.7 23.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning by 1000 AM MDT.
